name: The Simple Game (Saiket)
description:
Person wanted to test the game and give their opinion.

[Alpha] This is just a simple game, it combines a classic gameplay of a platformer keeping a good touch of difficulty, the colors and music look that although the game can be frustrating they reassure you to continue playing.

[Alfa] este es solo un juego sencillo, Combina Una Jugabilidad Clásica de la ONU plataformero Conservando Un buen toque de Dificultad, Los Colores y musica Buscan Que AUNQUE El juego Puede Ser frustante te tranquilisan párrafo Seguir jugando.
